project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game.

task.name: Define questions and answers in a structured format
Implement the quiz logic to display questions and capture user input
Keep track of the user's score based on their answers
Write tests for each of the implemented features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
